name: Explore The Iron City
description:
Back in April for The Pixel Dailies challenge I made this bit of pixel art with the theme "box art". What came to mind was the feeling of some old school adventure games so I used that for my inspiration. 

See the original piece through the link.

https://twitter.com/HorstenVault/status/1378737578472394755?s=20

Then along came the Retrograde Jam 2  and of course I had to use my old art as the base for a new game.

Explore the Iron City is a quick 3 level side scrolling platformer where the goal is to collect the macguffins...  sorry the idols hidden in each level. run, jump, climb and evade to creatures that lurk with in the city.

https://twitter.com/HorstenVault

Made for the Retrograde Jam 2 

https://itch.io/jam/retrograde-jam2

Hosted by Programancer

https://programancer.itch.io/
